turkish_example_sentence: Ben sabah kahvaltısında mutlu görünmemişsem kötü haberler aldım
english_example_sentence: If I didn't seem happy at breakfast this morning, I received bad news
russian_example_sentence: Если я не казался счастливым за завтраком утром, я получил плохие новости
